timeline.title: Chronograph iOS
timeline.description:
Started working on new iOS app - [Chronograph](https://apps.apple.com/app/chronograph/id1281918814). In-house application (App Dev Academy) with time tracking and task managment.

My role:
* Design iOS app architecture and create app from scratch
* Design CoreData database architecture

timeline.title: Cashbox
timeline.description:
First comercial iOS app

Main challenges for me here was:
* Implement sync with remove API and store data on device using CoreData
* Implement UI with charts and iPad support
* Codebase on Swift 1-2 (still raw and evolving at that time)

In-house application (App Dev Academy) with time tracking and task managment

timeline.title: SumDU
timeline.description:
Started working on [SumDU](https://apps.apple.com/ua/app/id698235283)
This is first iOS app, published to the App Store, that i'm worked on.
Souce code on GitHub - [sumdu-ios](https://github.com/appdev-academy/sumdu-ios)

For me, main challenges here was to implement custom navigation bar with nice and smooth animation. And implement custom layout for iPad veriosn of the app.

I build websites on PHP programming language, using frameworks such as Laravel, Kohana, Codeigniter, Yii. Also I used CSS3, HTML5, jQuery and Bootstrap for frontend.
First expirience of building and supporting comercial projects.
